fields.description: A control command, according to the Azure Data Explorer command syntax. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Command

fields.description: Control command timeout. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string), pattern: ((\d+)\.)?(\d\d):(60|([0-5][0-9])):(60|([0-5][0-9]))..)
fields.name: CommandTimeout
